root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S9600 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
4 sec (when Scene Mode is Set to Fireworks Show), 1/4000 sec (Maximum Speed During High-speed Continuous Shooting)
Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, HDMI Output: Can be Selected from Auto, 480p, 720p and 1080i

Focus Area Selecton: Face Priority, Center, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF, Digital Zoom Magnification: 35 mm (135) Equivalent 2200 mm, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Pre-flashes
12 Elements in 10 Groups (1 ED Lens Element)
50 cm (1 ft, 8 inch) - Infinity (W), 1.5 m (5 ft) - Infinity (T)

Single (Default Setting), Continuous H (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 6.7 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 5), Continuous L (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 2.2 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots 35), Pre-shooting Cache (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 20 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 25, Maximum of 5 Frames Captured in the Pre-shooting Cache), Continuous H: 120 fps (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 120 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 50), Continuous H: 60 fps (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 60 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 25), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16

Auto, Scene (Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Backlighting, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Easy Panorama, Pet Portrait), Smart Portrait, Special Effects
Matrix, Center-weighted, Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or More)

Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift and Electronic VR, Motion Blur Reduction (Still Picture), Tripod Socket: 1/4 (ISO 1222), Charging Time: 2 hr 20 min (when Using Charging AC Adapter EH-71P and when No Charge Remains), Still Pictures: 290 Shots when Using EN-EL12, Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-2 AV), Range: F3.4 - F6.8 Aperture 2 Steps, Movie (Actual Battery Life for Recording): 1 hr 5 min when Using EN-EL12, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal and 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Communications Protocols: IEEE 802.11b: DBPSK/DQPSK/CCK, IEEE 802.11g: OFDM, IEEE 802.11n: OFDM, Range (Line of Sight): 30 m (32 yd), Operating Frequency: 2412 - 2462 MHz (1 - 11 Channels), Data Rates (Actual Measured Values): IEEE 802.11b: 5 Mbps, IEEE 802.11g: 15 Mbps, IEEE 802.11n: 15 Mbps, Security: Open/WPA2, Lithium Battery (EN-EL12)

Auto, Scene (Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Backlighting, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Easy Panorama, Pet Portrait), Smart Portrait, Special Effects
File System: DCF, EXIF 2.3, DPOF Compliant
JPEG Sound Files (Voice Memo), Movies: MOV (Video: H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC)
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.

Hi , For Normal use it ll good camera, Not preferred one who likes photography, Looks big not a comfort one to hold in your hand and flash will inside the camera once you switch on the flash it ll come out that slot it was not sounds good i think after some months it may fail.I ll suggest go for some other Model.
Excellent pictures...Did not sync with my Lumia : (Battery is good.Easy to connect with PC....Color is as shown in the pictureFlipkart did as usual nice job. Thanks

Nice picture and Nice quality of picture. Only the problem with low light, when you take photos in low lights except a very good cam and zoom also good.Wifi facility is really awesome. I enjoyed it very much.Nice cam at very good price.

I purchased Nikon Coolpix S9600 Point & Shoot Camera it worked good but some manufacturing defect is there in the product. However Flipkart is arranging refund, but would like to mention here that product is very good in use, good quality of pics easy to handle. I will rate this product more than 5 stars. It is good for personal use for family picnic, party tour etc.
